title: 4000 posts sanction for GB on finance and revenue
content:
GILGIT, Nov 05 (APP): Adviser to the Prime Minister on Finance and Revenue Shaukat Tarin has sanctioned 4,000 posts for different departments in Gilgit-Baltistan.
According to a press statement, Shaukat Tarin has sanctioned the posts on the recommendation of the Chief Minister during a meeting through video link.
Tarin has also directed the authorities to issue NOC for the procurement of vehicles for police and other departments. He assured additional grant to Gilgit-Baltistan Government in December.
